titleStmt.title: The libertie of the subject against the pretended power of impositions. Maintained by an argument in Parliament an[o]. 7[o]. Jacobi Regis. / By William Hakevvil of Lincolns Inne Esq.
titleStmt.author: Hakewill, William, 1574-1655.

notesStmt.note: The words "William .. Esq." are enclosed in brackets on title page.
Bracketed "o" in title is in superscript.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
